name: Rank Science Inc.
description: Developer of an automated search engine optimization platform intended to improve a website's SEO through A/B testing and data science. The company's platform automates the process of running thousands of A/B tests in order to identify the changes that will improve the Google ranking of customer web pages in organic search results, enabling customers to optimize the delivery of web pages.
one_liner: Developer of an automated search engine optimization platform intended to improve a website's SEO through A/B testing and data science. The company's platform automates the process of running thousands of A/B tests in order to identify the changes that will improve the Google ranking of customer web pages in organic search results, enabling customers to optimize the delivery of web pages.
